dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Walz (for himself and Mr. Gibson) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to eliminate the age restriction on the commencement of the receipt of retired pay for non-regular service.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Support America’s Armed Forces Reserve Component Retirees Act of 2015.

section.header: Elimination of age restriction on commencement of receipt of retired pay for non-regular service

subsection.text: Section 12731(a)(1) of title 10, United States Code, is amended by striking person; and inserting person, except that, in the case of any person who first enters a uniformed service on or after January 1, 2018, this paragraph shall not apply;.

subsection.header: Conforming amendment relating to computation of retired pay base
subsection.text: Section 1407(d)(4) of title 10, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following new sentence: In the case of a member or former member who first became a member on or after January 1, 2018, and whose retired pay is covered by paragraph (1) or (2), the 36 months shall only include months for which the member was entitled to monthly basic pay..
